name: My Dinner with André
description:
Hi-D-Ho Gamerinos!

My Dinner with André is a Simpsons Fan Game inspired by the Noise Land Video Arcade game featured in the episode 'Boy Scoutz 'n the Hood' from Season 5.

Join actors André Gregory and Wallace Shawn at the dinner table as they discuss the important matters of life. Choose from three separate retorts as you progress through an approximately 10 minute long discussion created in the spirit of Louis Malle's 1981 comedy film of the same name.

Each retort will lead to unique dialogue:

Tell me more: André will keep talking.

Trenchant Insight: Wallace will offer some insight of his own.

Bon Mot: Wallace will offer a witticism.

For many years, I have been thinking about how to turn this 10 second gag into something that can be actually played. The end result is this! Play in browser or download the ROM to play on a system of your choice. I hope you enjoy!
- Gumpy Function.

CONTROLSGAME BOYKEYBOARDMove Cursor
D-padArrow Keys
Select Retort/Progress Dialogue
AZStart Game
StartEnterChange Palette (from the Title Screen)
D-pad, A, B, Select
Arrow Keys, Z, X, Shift

Disclaimer: This is a fan game and not intended for sale or profit. All rights belong to their respective owners. This is a work of satire, the characters depicted within are fictional. This fan game contains suicide themes, if you need help, talk to a professional or someone that loves you.

CREDITS
